name: Brightening Mask with Turmeric, Adaptogens and AHAs
about: What it is: A brightening and exfoliating mask that contains AHAs, non-staining turmeric, hemp seed oil, and holy basil to promote a visibly smooth, glowing complexion...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Mask..Highlighted Ingredients:- Turmeric: Antioxidant-rich; visibly improves redness and brightens..- AHAs/Glycolic Acids: Acids from orange, lemon, and bilberry to exfoliate and resurface..- Hemp Seed Oil: Amino acid rich oil relieves dryness due to redness and imparts a visibly glow...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Based on the Ayurvedic recipe for hyperpigmentation, Sahajanu2019s Brightening Mask is inspired by the traditional Haldi Indian wedding ceremony where the bride is adorned with a ritual mask to brighten and detox the skin, giving her the best glow....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Turmeric: Antioxidant-rich; visibly improves redness and brightens..-AHAs/Glycolic Acids: Acids from orange, lemon, and bilberry to exfoliate and resurface..-Hemp Seed Oil: Amino acid rich oil relieves dryness due to redness and imparts a visibly glow....Aqua, Kaolin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyeride, Coco-caprylate/Caprate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cannabis Sativa Oil, Coco-Caprylate, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Olivoyl Glutamate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Hippophae Rhamnoides Extract, Stearyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol,Root Extract, Glycerin, Citrus Sinensis, Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Oil, Dehydroacetic Acid, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/ Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Powder, Litsea Cubeba, Tocopherol....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To a cleansed face, apply a thick amount of mask to the face and neck avoiding the area under the eyes..-Leave on for 15 minutes..-A slight tingling may be experienced.-Your skin will absorb what it needs..-Rinse off with warm water..-Use once weekly....Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse the jar and recycle..-Rinse the cap if needed and drop off to your nearest Pact bin or discard as waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time I tried the mask, I did not apply enough product and it clumped (my skin was not fully dry).  Second time I tried mask, I made sure to dry my face fully and apply a thick layer avoiding the eye area.  The mask changed from an opaque white to a translucent colour. My skin tingled a little - not uncomfortable, and I removed with warm water and a clean cloth 10 minutes later.  i was impressed with how smooth and bright my face looked.  Mild erythema of my cheeks but that resolved within 10 minutes or so after applying Sahajan radiance serum.  Great mask. I look forward to using it again.

reviews.review_title: Truly brighter smoother skin with this mask!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time I tried the mask it was clumpy in texture - this was my fault because my skin was not fully dry.  Next day to clean dry skin, I applied the mask and made sure to apply a thick layer (I did not apply a thick layer first trial).  It went on smoothly.  About 3-4 minutes in I felt a slight tingle on my skin; not painful or uncomfortable.  Left on for 10 minutes and removed with warm water and a clean towel.  The results:  my skin was bright, fresh, smooth and incredibly soft.  There was mild erythema to my cheeks in particular but this resolved within about 10 minutes and after applying Sahajan radiance serum and moisturizer. I would advise those with sensitive skin (like myself) to not exfoliate or use any products with peeling agents for a few days before and perhaps a few days after the mask.
